description:

Welcome to Love Merchant Hospital and Clinic!

We are proud to present a new something for your sensory pleasure!

- Dea|bir|th Real -

A game whose only button is "Y"

What's the difference between a Game and a Nightmare anyway?

--

What to be expected

|--------==== Give Birth to ?Death? ====---------|

|-----------===|| The Asmodai Will Come ||===------------|

|-----------==== Pure Bliss ====------------|

--

Be sure to read the Doctor Notes included before starting. You need to learn how to deliver a baby(a something).

||| A Colorful Death Poem |||

|✝| Demon are born without teeth |✝|

||| I hate it so much |||

-Hugs from your Pal, LOVE MERCHANT DEAD GHOST
